description:
Heidari Law Group, PC, serves Las Vegas, Nevada, with top-level personal injury representation. We also have three offices in California, including Sacramento and Los Angeles.

Our dedication to justice has resulted in many multimillion-dollar recoveries on behalf of our clients. Our law firm follows cases through to the end, no matter how complex they may become.

Handling the most challenging cases

Our law firm handles a variety of cases. Some of our colleagues even refer more complex matters to us due to a range of practice areas. Examples include medical malpractice, premises liability, aviation and mass-transportation accidents, product liability and trucking accidents. We also efficiently represent clients with injuries from car crashes, animal bites, brain trauma, construction accidents and other incidents. In addition to personal injury, we handle cases concerning employment and labor law and civil rights issues.

Dedicating ourselves to our clients' success

We do not get paid until we win. More than that, we truly care about our clients' injuries and want them to get the help they need to recover. This is why we strive to respond as quickly as possible to all questions, even outside of normal business hours.

Offering highly accessible fee options

We strive to give injured people the representation they need to win their cases. That is why Heidari Law Group, PC, offers free initial consultations, credit card payment options and virtual appointments. Our law office does not get paid in personal injury cases until our attorneys win.
